action.action-desc: Mr. Kustoff of Tennessee (for himself, Mr. Kilmer, Mr. Deutch, Mr. Poe of Texas, Mr. Kennedy, and Mrs. McMorris Rodgers) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on the Judiciary

form.official-title: To amend title 18, United States Code, to provide for the protection of community centers with religious affiliation, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Combating Anti-Semitism Act of 2017.

section.header: Protection of community centers with religious affiliation
section.text: Section 247 of title 18, United States Code, is amended—

paragraph.text: in subsection (a)(1), by inserting after or attempts the following: or threatens;
in subsection (c), by inserting after or attempts the following: or threatens;

subparagraph.text: in paragraph (3), by striking the and at the end;
by redesignating paragraph (4) as paragraph (5); and
by inserting after paragraph (3) the following:

paragraph.text: if damage to or destruction of property results from the acts committed in violation of this section, a fine in accordance with this title and imprisonment for not more than 5 years, or both; and
in subsection (f), by inserting before the period at the end the following: , or real property owned or leased by a nonprofit, religiously affiliated organization.
